newsArray.title: Mater Dei 4-Star RB puts Alabama in Top 4
creator: Justin Smith, Touchdown Alabama Magazine
newsArray.description: Jordon Davison confirmed he has released his top four via Instagram. Alabama, Georgia, Oregon ad Michigan are in Davison’s top four. The junior attends Mater Dei High School, and he is a 2025 prospect.
